item.title: Gros Morne Justice: Chapter 1
item.description: Plot Summary Chapter 1 opens with a picturesque description of the Crandall residence. We meet our hero Jack, his wife Dorothy, and their son Calvin, who currently works at a funeral home, in addition to helping out with his fatherâ€™s outfitting business. The wealthy Americans arrive, and after one day of hunting, all but one of the hunters has killed a bear. Rick, the leader of the American group, is completely soured by not having bagged a bear.

item.title: Gros Morne Justice: Part 1
item.description: Have you ever read a book with plot turns so swift and surprising that you needed to put the book down multiple times to catch your breath? That was our experience just reading the back cover of Gros Morne Justice: A Bear Romantic Comedy Buddy Cop Political Intrigue Survival Thriller. Take a look:   We found this gem at a yard sale on our way back from a camping trip on the Fundy coast of New Brunswick.
